findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose the parties to significant liability without recourse in case of breaches or claims.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to fees paid may not adequately protect against substantial damages, especially in cases of serious breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: The absence of intellectual property provisions may lead to disputes regarding ownership and use of intellectual property created during the agreement.
The ability to audit without clear limitations may lead to disputes or perceived invasions of privacy or confidentiality.
findings.evidence_quote: The Disclosing Party may audit the Receiving Party's records upon reasonable notice during normal business hours.
